chat.message.limitedrespawns.time_back: You will come back once you've received %s more respawns
purgatory.limitedrespawns.lost_respawns: You have lost all your respawns, you will respawn once you've gained %s respawns.
purgatory.limitedrespawns.lost_respawns_: You have lost all your respawns, you are now permanently dead.
